I’ve taught (or am (or will be) teaching) the following classes:

  • Discrete Structures and Probability (CSCI 0220), Spring 2025 (@Brown), co-taught with Rob Lewis

  • Frontiers of Graph Algorithms Seminar (CSCI 1952C), Fall 2023 (@Brown)
  • Advanced Topics in Discrete Optimization (401-3900-00), Fall 2022 (@ETHZ), co-taught with Richard Santiago
